text:
Prominent Edge | Full Stack, DevOps, and Data Scientists | Chantilly, VA and Remote | Full Time

Prominent Edge is a boutique, onshore studio that builds impactful digital solutions using secure open source technologies.

Exceptional benefits, including: Free healthcare (PPO/PSO) for entire family

- 6% 401k matching, immediately vested

- 6 weeks of paid time off

- Get paid for every hour you work

- Get the latest and greatest laptop and tools

- Company retreats

For more details please visit https://prominentedge.bamboohr.com/jobs/
